item.description:
Do you love French language and culture? Parlons francais ensemble. Cette semaine nous allons parler de .... c'est une surprise! Il y a beaucoup de gens who would like to parler avec vous! Venez prendre un café ou patisserie chez Panera. Look for the table with the Tour Eiffel!! We meet the 2nd and 4th Wednesday of each month at 7PM. If you arrive punctually and there is nobody there, just wait a few minutes- some of us travel long distances or work late. Not everyone RSVP's, so there are usually many more people than shown here. Bienvenue! et a bientot!

Please note: Some of us might not be there exactly at 7:00.  We often work late and do our best to get there.  If you don't see anyone, just sit in the back rrom and we will join you. 

Those of you needing directions to  Panera: Your GPS might send you on a less than desirable route. We Recommend I-84 to exit 43 (Park Rd/West Hartford Center).  Turn left at the end of the exit, then right at the second light. That will be South Main Street.  Stay on  Main Street all the way, pass through West Hartford Center, continue on to the next shopping center with Marshalls and Walgreens.  At the big interesection , turn left and you will immediately see Staples.  Panera is next to Staples. It's almost four miles from the exit.  It's easy if you go this way.

group.name: The West Hartford Groupe de French

item.name: The West Hartford Groupe de French Monthly Meetup
